catalog_info.title: Intermediate Sumerian
catalog_info.notes: Sumerian 120A/120B is an indivisible year-long course. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Knowledge of basic Sumerian grammar, vocabulary, and cuneiform script.
catalog_info.description: Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
